pageContent: Background: Prostate cancer is the most common male cancer in developed countries and diagnosis and treatment carries with it substantial morbidity and related unmet supportive care needs. These difficulties may be amplified by physical inactivity and obesity. We propose to apply a multimodal intervention approach that targets both unmet supportive care needs and physical activity.

metaData.source:
Molecular targets of selenium in prostate cancer prevention (Review)
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/21567081/
